data.displayName: NTFA Business Single Rate/Heating/OffPeak Night Only

fees.description: Connection Fee, typically applies for move in requests.
Disconnection Fee, typically applies for move out requests.

electricityContract.terms: For full terms and conditions, please go to www.solsticeenergy.com.au

discounts.description: Discount is conditional on account holder being a member or affiliate of the Northern Tasmanian Football Association (NTFA) and being a Solstice Energy customer at time of consumption. Discount applies to usage and daily supply charges, inclusive of GST. Discount does not apply to solar feed in tariff, or other fees and charges.

electricityContract.variation: We will give you notice of any variation to the tariffs and/or charges that affect you at least 5 business days before the variation is to apply to you.

eligibility.description: To be eligible for this offer, you must receive a valid promo code from a member club of the Northern Tasmanian Football Association (NTFA) or a member of that member club. If you want to find out whether your club is a member club of the NTFA, please go to www.ntfa.org.au.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Contract continues until terminated by you, or by us in accordance with our terms and conditions This product includes a discount of 5% on total bill that applies for the duration of the benefit period, once the benefit period finishes, the 5% discount will no longer apply. Before the end of the benefit period, we will let you know what your options are
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: No credit card fees or late payment fees are applicable.
